txt.en: 'These slain Orcs... they remind me of him. Alas that it cannot be! He is gone, and we are alone, but for this nameless warrior who slays Orcs in the north.\n\n'It is a shame that this warrior cannot kill Núrzum. None of us can. Wildermore is doomed at last.'
You appear to have come upon a trail of vengeance, left by a mysterious warrior whose deeds strongly resemble Thrymm's....
Solve the mystery of the slain Orcs
'I would like to find who did this. We need strong warriors to protect the people, for I believe it is time for us to evacuate.'
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls, kneeling over a pile of slain Orcs.\n\nYou should speak with Cyneberg.
Gárwig is in the Mead Hall of Forlaw.\n\nYou should speak with Gárwig.
'We are ready, [placeholder]. I have hope once more.\n\n'No matter what happens, you will be remembered as the hero of Wildermore until the end of days.'
